message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! However, I've invested a lot in this product and I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $175.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155.
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to go up to $165.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $160.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a price that's worth it. I'm willing to go up to $170.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $162.
I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob! I'm willing to make one last concession. I'm willing to meet you at $165, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $159.
